title: Penal insÃ³lito y escÃ¡ndalo en L'Alcudia: Argentina festejÃ³ el empate ante Mauritania, que explotÃ³ contra el Ã¡rbitro y la Guardia Civil
text: Esta semana, ademÃ¡s de los Juegos OlÃ­mpicos, se disputa el tradicional torneo juvenil COTIF Lâ€™Alcudia, aquel que fue la catapulta de Lionel Scaloni y el que la SelecciÃ³n Argentina ganÃ³ en tres ocasiones (2012, 2018 y 2022). Este jueves, en su tercera presentaciÃ³n en la actual ediciÃ³n y dirigido por Diego Placente, la Albiceleste fue protagonista de otro escÃ¡ndalo, como si lo de Marruecos en ParÃ­s no hubiera alcanzado para colmar esa casilla. Es que lo favorecieron con un penal inexistente que le permitiÃ³ salvar un empate agÃ³nico 1-1 contra Mauritania, cuyos jugadores explotaron contra el Ã¡rbitro y se enfrentaron a la Guardia Civil. GOL DE MAURITANIAâ€” DSPORTS (@DSports) ðŸ‡²ðŸ‡· Bilal Maouloud, de cabeza, anotÃ³ el 1-0 contra Argentina en el Torneo Internacional de L'Alcudia. [#COTIFEnDSPORTS] [#COTIF2024] [pic.twitter.com/KyO0NLp3RT] [July 25, 2024] Bilal Maouloud habÃ­a adelantado a los africanos, con un cabezazo apenas iniciado el segundo tiempo del encuentro, que se disputa en dos etapas de 40 minutos, a diferencia de los encuentros internacionales habituales. Â¡PENAL SANCIONADO Y LA GUARDIA CIVIL ADENTRO DE LA CANCHA! ðŸ˜±ðŸ˜±ðŸ˜±â€” DSPORTS (@DSports) Final con escÃ¡ndalo en el Torneo Internacional de L'Alcudia entre Argentina y Mauritania. [#COTIFEnDSPORTS] [#COTIF2024] [pic.twitter.com/0f0JGuLAh8] [July 25, 2024] A los 85 minutos, cinco despuÃ©s de lo reglamentario, Sosa se metiÃ³ dentro del Ã¡rea y lanzÃ³ un centro desde la derecha, pero en la continuidad de la carrera fue chocado por un defensor de Mauritania. El Ã¡rbitro espaÃ±ol decidiÃ³ cobrar penal y ahÃ­ se desatÃ³ un primer foco de conflicto, porque los jugadores africanos no podÃ­an entender la sanciÃ³n. DespuÃ©s de varios minutos de demora, Maher Mauricio Carriso se hizo cargo de la pena mÃ¡xima y definiÃ³ con categorÃ­a abriendo el pie zurdo para colocar la pelota contra un palo y celebrar la igualdad. Â¡PENAL Y ESCÃNDALO!â€” DSPORTS (@DSports) ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡· Argentina, sobre el final, igualÃ³ 1-1 con Mauritania tras un polÃ©mico fallo. âš½ï¸ Maher Carrizo, el autor del gol en el Torneo Internacional de L'Alcudia. [#COTIFEnDSPORTS] [#COTIF2024] [pic.twitter.com/0853grX5Nf] [July 25, 2024] Durante el festejo albiceleste, los futbolistas de Mauritania volvieron a lanzarse encima del Ã¡rbitro, mientras Ã©ste mostraba tarjetas y se retiraba junto a sus colaboradores. TambiÃ©n ingresÃ³ a resguardarlo la Guardia Civil, cuyos efectivos incluso sacaron sus palos para defenderse de los empujones. Los argentinos celebrando el gol, el Ã¡rbitro yÃ©ndose escoltado... ðŸ˜±â€” DSPORTS (@DSports) Â¡QuÃ© lÃ­o se armÃ³ en el Torneo Internacional de L'Alcudia! [#COTIFEnDSPORTS] [#COTIF2024] [pic.twitter.com/YplCEMoEHY] [July 25, 2024] El sÃ¡bado, Argentina -que acumula dos triunfos y un empate- cerrarÃ¡ la fase de grupos contra Valencia, en la bÃºsqueda de la clasificaciÃ³n a las semifinales, que se disputarÃ¡n el domingo. El lunes serÃ¡ el tercer puesto y el martes la final. Es la dÃ©cima participaciÃ³n del conjunto nacional, que ademÃ¡s de los tres tÃ­tulos mencionados sumÃ³ otros dos subcampeonatos (2013 y 2016), dos medallas de bronce (2014 y 2019) y el cuarto puesto en 2009 y 2010. author: MENAFN
title: Growing Advancement In Cancer Therapies To Provide Better Treatment To Propel Cancer Immunotherapy Market Growth At CAGR 8.4% By 2031
text: Forgot Username or Password Date (MENAFN- GetNews) "Cancer Immunotherapy Market"Cancer Immunotherapy market size was valued at USD 125.4 billion in 2022 and is poised to grow from USD 135.93 billion in 2023 to USD 259.16 billion by 2031, growing at a CAGR of 8.4% during the forecast period (2024-2031). Cancer Immunotherapy Market size was valued at USD 135.93 billion in 2023 to USD 259.16 billion by 2031, growing at a CAGR of 8.4% during the forecast period (2024-2031).Cancer immunotherapy is a kind of treatment that could enhance the immune systems' potential to fight against cancer. This treatment is more effective compared to the traditional method. This is because it provides long-term protection against cancer, can treat various types of cancer, and has less side effects. Cancers that can be treated with the help of immunotherapy consists of breast cancer, colorectal cancer, and prostate cancer. The demand for cancer immunotherapy is rapidly increasing because of the rising prevalence of cancer globally. Nowadays, people are also becoming more aware about the advantages of cancer immunotherapy, boosting the growth of the market. The popularity of immunotherapy is increasing among patients and medical providers as it offers targeted and personalized treatment option. Furthermore, continuous research and development on monoclonal antibodies, is also fueling advancement in the field and increasing treatment options. This is because these are the primary element of cancer biologics and immunotherapy treatments. These factors are developing a favourable market setting for cancer immunotherapy and boosting innovation in cancer treatment. Request your free sample PDF of the report today : Emergence of Oncolytic Virus Treatment to Increase Demand for Cancer Immunotherapy The oncolytic virus treatment is a type of immunotherapy. The viruses make use of genetically modified viruses that has the potential to infect and kill cancer cells, while leaving the healthy cells. The popularity of oncolytic virus therapy has increased especially after FDA gave its approval of the first oncolytic virus treatment for melanoma. Researchers are now emphasizing on engineering viruses that can provide therapeutic genes directly into the cancer cells and trigger an immune response against the tumor. The process of oncolytic virus treatment is directly destroying the tumor cells and helping the main immune system to target cancer more efficiently. Developments in Checkpoint Inhibitors to Offer Advanced Therapeutic Options for Various Cancers The checkpoint inhibitors have massively transformed the field of cancer treatment, offering new therapeutic choices for a wide range of cancers. These drugs function by blocking protein interactions that prevent T-cells, which is a kind of immune cells, from attacking cancer cells. Many companies are investing in the research of these checkpoint inhibitors due to the success of the drug targeting PD-1/PD-L1 and CTLA-4 pathways. Medical researchers are developing new advanced inhibitors that has the capability to target other immune checkpoints. The research and development of this drug is shifting towards combination therapies. In these types of treatment checkpoint inhibitors are utilized along with other kinds of cancer treatment to increase efficiency and overcome resistance. In October 2023,Pfizerintroduced new the MEKTOVI + BRAFTOVI treatment in the market. This treatment that can be used on adult patients suffering from metastatic non-small cell lung cancer. In October 2023,the US FDA granted approval of Merck'santi-PD-1 therapy KEYTRUDA. This treatment can be used on patients with resectable non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC). In December 2023, the U.S. FDA provided approval for the FRUZAQLA for Previously Treated Metastatic Colorectal Cancer by Takeda For a tailored report, contact us to request a free customization : Market has the Following Segments: Type Monoclonal Antibodies [Naked Monoclonal Antibodies, Conjugated Monoclonal Antibodies, Bispecific Monoclonal Antibodies], Vaccines [Prophylactic Vaccines, Therapeutic Vaccines], Checkpoint Inhibitors [Cytotoxic T-Lymphocyte-Associated Protein-4 (CTLA-4), Programmed Death 1 (PD-1) & Programmed Death Ligand 1 (PD-L1)], Cell Therapies [Chimeric Antigen Receptor (CAR) T Cell Therapy, Dendritic Cells], Immunomodulators [Granulocyte-Macrophage Colony-Stimulating Factor (Gm-Csf & G-Csf), Interferons (IFN), Interleukins (IL), Oncolytic Virus (Immunotherapy, Immunity as an Obstacle, Immunity as an Ally, Approved Products & Clinical Trails)] Application Lung Cancer Breast Cancer Multiple Myeloma Colorectal Cancer Head & Neck Cancer Prostate Cancer Melanoma Other Cancer Types End User Hospitals Clinics Others Key Players Operating in the Cancer Immunotherapy Market Amgen Inc. AstraZeneca Bayer AG Bristol-Myers Squibb Eli Lilly and Company Janssen Global Services, LLC Merck & Co., Inc. Novartis Pfizer Inc. F. Hoffmann-La Roche Ltd Gilead Sciences, Inc. GlaxoSmithKline plc AbbVie Inc. Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. Adaptimmune Therapeutics plc Incyte Corporation Bluebird bio, Inc. BioNTech SE Immunocore Limited CureVac N.V. BeiGene, Ltd. Zymeworks Inc. Purchase now to gain valuable insights and stay informed : Growing Demand for CAR-T Cell Therapies to Treat Specific Types of Leukemia and Lymphoma The demand for chimeric antigen receptor T-cell therapy is rapidly increasing in cancer immunotherapy due to its constant advancement. This method is comprised of genetically modifying a patients T-cells for detecting and attacking cancer cells. The popularity of CAR-T cell therapies is increasing because it can be used for successfully treating certain kinds of leukemia and lymphoma. Many companies are also heavily investing in CAR-T cell therapies so that researchers can expand their usage in other cancers like solid tumors. Furthermore, constant research and innovation is also enhancing the safety and effectiveness of these therapies, especially in controlling serious immune reactions. To read the full report, please visit : MENAFN17102024003238003268ID1108793086 Legal Disclaimer: MENAFN provides the information â€œas isâ€ without warranty of any kind. title: JustiÃ§a pede que Xande de Pilares e Ferrugem troquem letra de mÃºsica considerada islamofÃ³bica
text:
A AssociaÃ§Ã£o Nacional de Juristas IslÃ¢micos (ANAJI) entrou na JustiÃ§a e o MinistÃ©rio PÃºblico do Estado de SÃ£o Paulo acatou o pedido da organizaÃ§Ã£o, e determinou que os cantores e compositores da mÃºsica Me abraÃ§a, entre eles
Xande de Pilares e Ferrugem, adequem a obra no prazo de 30 dias, sob pena de multa de R$ 10 mil.
A associaÃ§Ã£o ainda pede uma indenizaÃ§Ã£o de R$ 30 mil por danos morais coletivos. A comunidade islÃ¢mica alega que um trecho da canÃ§Ã£o contÃ©m conotaÃ§Ã£o preconceituosa e sugere que todos os seguidores do IslÃ£ seriam terroristas.
Xande de Pilares e Ferrugem gravaram a mÃºsica da autoria de Claudemir JÃºnior, Peu Cavalcante e Rodrigo Leite.
No processo, obtido por Quem, a ANAJI questiona o seguinte trecho: "Pra que bombardeio, pra que engatilhar. Aqui nÃ£o Ã© IrÃ£, ou IslÃ£, BagdÃ¡. Foi sÃ³ um mau tempo que ainda dÃ¡ tempo. Desarma essa bomba em nome de AlÃ¡".
Na aÃ§Ã£o, a comunidade islÃ¢mica ressalta, no entanto, que "busca apenas a adequaÃ§Ã£o da mÃºsica e nÃ£o sua suspensÃ£o, em respeito Ã  liberdade artÃ­stica, visto que essa possui um trecho que viola os direitos da comunidade muÃ§ulmana no Brasil, ao associar a religiÃ£o islÃ¢mica ao terrorismo."
"Como se depreende da transcriÃ§Ã£o acima, evidente que as palavras utilizadas na 4Âª estrofe acabam transmitindo aos ouvintes a ideia de que todos os seguidores do IslÃ£ sÃ£o terroristas e assassinos quando compara o desarme de bomba a AlÃ¡, dando a falsa concepÃ§Ã£o de que a religiÃ£o propaga a violÃªncia e atos terroristas", argumenta outro trecho da aÃ§Ã£o.
Procurada por Quem, a assessoria de comunicaÃ§Ã£o de Xande de Pilares contou que o escritÃ³rio que representa os artistas tirou a mÃºsica do ar do YouTube hÃ¡ trÃªs meses e, agora, aguarda a retirada da obra do Spotify.
"A Gold, escritÃ³rio de empresariamento dos dois artistas, derrubou, num primeiro momento (trÃªs meses atrÃ¡s), a faixa no YouTube e, ontem, quando receberam a notificaÃ§Ã£o, pediu ao Spotify a retirada da mÃºsica. Vale ressaltar que eles nÃ£o sÃ£o os compositores e que, portanto, a Ãºnica providÃªncia Ã© retirar a mÃºsica das plataformas", informou a assessoria.
Quem tambÃ©m procurou a assessoria de comunicaÃ§Ã£o do Spotify para saber quando a mÃºsica sairia da plataforma, mas ainda nÃ£o teve retorno.

author: dom
title: Mary Groot Koerkamp 1936 2024
text: Parcourez la nÃ©crologie de Mary Groot Koerkamp 1936 2024 rÃ©sidant dans la province Manitoba pour le dÃ©tail des funÃ©railles. Obituary of Mary Groot Koerkamp Mary Groot Koerkamp It is with great sadness that we announce the peaceful passing of Mary Groot Koerkamp on Tuesday, October 22, 2024 at the age of 88. She will be lovingly remembered and forever missed by Arnold, her husband of 63 years, daughter Karen Vangelis of Vancouver, sister Angela Chernowas of Winnipeg and numerous nieces, nephews and cousins. Mary was predeceased by daughter Laurie, mother Antonia (Drykacz), father Stanley (Czarnowas), siblings â€“ Joseph (Czarnowas), Josephine (Lucas Flysak), Thomas (Chernowas), Stanley (Chernowas), sister Gabriel (Czarnowas), Alice (Mike Zwarich) and Lillian (Peter Boyko). Mary was a quiet and gentle person who looked forward to spending the summer weekends at their trailer in Lee River. She and Arnold would return to the city with their car loaded with vegetables from their huge garden. They shared their harvest with family and friends alike. Mary, along with her daughter Laurie, also enjoyed many crafts â€“ knitting, petty point, cross stitch, embroidery, crocheting to name a few. There was never a pattern that was too difficult. Each year they entered their crafts at the Red River Exhibition Craft Show and won many ribbons. Working on puzzles was also a favourite pastime. A special thank you to all the staff at Fred Douglas Lodge for their care and compassion during Maryâ€™s stay. A service will be held on Wednesday, October 30th at Cropo Funeral Chapel, 1442 Main Street at 1:00 pm followed by an interment at Glen Eden Cemetery, 4477 Main Street. In lieu of flowers donations can be made to the Alzheimer Society of Manitoba, 10-120 Donald Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba R3C 4G2 1936 2024 Nos plus sincÃ¨res sympathies Ã  la famille et aux amis de Mary Groot Koerkamp 1936 2024.. DÃ©cÃ¨s pour la Ville: Winnipeg, Province: Manitoba avis deces Mary Groot Koerkamp 1936 2024 necrologie Mary Groot Koerkamp 1936 2024 Nous offrons nos plus sincÃ¨res condolÃ©ances Ã  la famille et aux amis de Mary Groot Koerkamp 1936 2024 et espÃ©rons que leur mÃ©moire pourra Ãªtre une source de rÃ©confort pendant cette pÃ©riode difficile. Vos pensÃ©es et vos mots aimables sont grandement apprÃ©ciÃ©s.

author: Redazione Bergamo online
title: Aggredito davanti al figlio disabile, la condanna dei farmacisti. Â«Episodi di violenza sempre piÃ¹ frequentiÂ» | Corriere.it
text:
di Redazione Bergamo online Il 65enne picchiato a Treviglio per avere saltato la coda, Federfarma e Fofi: Â«Atto ingiustificato e inaccettabile anche perchÃ© avvenuto in un luogo che si prende cura delle personeÂ»
Â«Esprimiamo solidarietÃ  nei confronti delle persone aggredite e condanniamo profondamente il comportamento di chi ha aggredito in maniera ingiustificata e inaccettabile. Tanto piÃ¹ inaccettabile perchÃ© l'aggressione Ã¨ avvenuta in farmacia, luogo sanitario profondamente integrato nella rete sociale territoriale, che ha come prima vocazione la cura della persona, in special modo la cura dei piÃ¹ fragili Â». Lo dichiara Gianni Petrosillo, vicepresidente di Federfarma, presidente del Sunifar e presidente dei rurali di Bergamo in relazione all'aggressione avvenuta all'interno della farmacia Piccinelli , in via Verga a Treviglio, dove martedÃ¬ 23 gennaio un 65enne Ã¨ stato picchiato da un altro cliente per non essersi messo in coda. L'uomo, che era con il figlio disabile, era stato chiamato al bancone direttamente dal farmacista.
Â«Le farmacie italiane, le farmacie di comunitÃ  - prosegue Petrosillo - si caratterizzano per prossimitÃ  e capacitÃ  di relazione con i cittadini , ed Ã¨ inammissibile che in questi luoghi si verifichino vergognosi episodi di violenza, tanto piÃ¹ se scatenati dal giusto e coerente comportamento del farmacista, che con sensibilitÃ  aveva accolto le esigenze dei suoi pazientiÂ».
Sulla stessa lunghezza d'onda il presidente della Federazione degli Ordini dei farmacisti italiani (Fofi), Andrea Mandelli: Â« Un atto di violenza ingiustificato che lascia davvero tanta amarezza ed Ã¨ un segnale che deve farci riflettere su quanto la nostra societÃ  abbia smarrito i suoi valori piÃ¹ profondi della solidarietÃ  e del rispetto verso il prossimo. Desidero esprimere la massima vicinanza all'uomo aggredito e a suo figlio e la piena solidarietÃ  al collega coinvolto in questa triste vicenda mentre era impegnato al servizio della comunitÃ . Episodi di intolleranza e di violenza, che purtroppo si ripetono con preoccupante frequenza, non dovrebbero coinvolgere chi si prende cura del benessere dei cittadini - evidenzia Mandelli -. La farmacia Ã¨ un presidio di salute, ma Ã¨ anche un luogo di accoglienza dove le persone, soprattutto quelle piÃ¹ vulnerabili, in qualsiasi momento possono trovare ascolto e conforto da parte del farmacistaÂ».
Vai a tutte le notizie di Bergamo
